attributes.action: Allow furry fandom to be socially accepted in today's modern society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow furry fandom to be socially accepted in today's modern society and have the same equal opportunities to animals and humans alike in whatever that furry wants to do...as long as it is legal it their country of residency's law.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
